operations.description: Sign in to the management portal, with read-only access to resources, scenarios and configuration settings except for the bot instance keys & secrets and the end-user inputs.
operations.name: Microsoft.HealthBot/healthBots/Reader/Action

operations.description: Sign in to the management portal, view and edit all the bot resources, scenarios and configuration settings except for the bot instance keys & secrets and the end-user inputs. Read-only access to the bot skills and channels.
operations.name: Microsoft.HealthBot/healthBots/Editor/Action

operations.description: Sign in to the management portal, view and edit all of the bot resources, scenarios, configuration settings, instance keys & secrets.
operations.name: Microsoft.HealthBot/healthBots/Admin/Action
